name: Ariados
description: The Long Leg Pokémon. Every night, it wanders around in search of prey, whose movements it restrains by spewing threads before it bites into them with its fangs.

abilities.name: Swarm
abilities.description: This Pokémon doubles its STAB bonus when it has 25% or less of its maximum health.

abilities.name: Insomnia
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to sleep.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.description: On a critical hit made by this Pokémon, triple the dice roll instead of doubling it.
